dataObject.content: In his failed bid for the Democrat nomination for 2020, Beto Oâ€™Rourke said churches that oppose same-sex marriage should lose their tax-exempt status.  In other words, toe the non-Biblical party line or else!

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"This is biased because it calls Beto O'Rourke's bid for the nomination 'failed' and also seemed to mock the fact that he lost because of his views on churches and same-sex marriage."}
